Sentencas: Thermodynamic, exergy, economic and environmental analysis of a solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine hybrid cycle have been done in this paper.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Also, multi-objective optimization of this cycle has been done by NSGA-II algorithm.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: In order to defining of the optimum design point, interactive fuzzy multi-objective method has been used.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: At optimum point, the cost function value, 0.0435 (U.S$/s) and exergy efficiency approximately 57.7% have been obtained.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: As well, sensitivity analysis of fuel cost per energy unit into objective functions has been done.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: In addition, rising inlet temperature of gas turbine from 900 up to 1600 (K), has caused an increase in output power up to 8.5% and entropy generation about 30% and a reduction in exergy efficiency from 61.9% to 51.7%.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: By evaluation of entropy generation rate, it has been concluded that most of enthalpy generation rate (32%) is related to combustion chamber.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Increasing of fuel cell stack temperature causes an increase in exergy efficiency from 56.6% up to 60.2% and about 34.8% in output power of the cycle and a reduction in exergy efficiency from 62.8% to 59.1% and 8.4% in fuel cell power.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Also, payback time of this cycle is about 3.12 years.
Titulo: Exergy, economic and environmental analysis and multi-objective optimization of a SOFC-GT power plant
